item.title: COVID-19 and Climate Change
item.description: Estimated reading time: 10 minutesâ€¦ but there are pretty pictures! I attended an online webinar the other day organized by the Canadian Association of Physicians for the Environment (CAPE). The session was titled â€œCOVID-19 and climate change - Where do we go from here?â€ and consisted of a panel of speakers, including physicians and other board members of the organization. I was interested because I had heard something about carbon emissions dropping ever since people have been staying home and the economy had been slowing down.
